table.name: vtiger_bhscampaign
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_bhscampaign` ( `bhscampaignid` int(19) NOT NULL, `campaign_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bhscampaignid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_bhscampaigncf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_bhscampaigncf` ( `bhscampaignid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bhscampaignid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
